mapper.select: select ptno from p_prdt_order group by ptno order by count(*) desc limit 8
select ono, meno, ptno, cnt, tot_pric, payopt, paydt, parc_name, parc_no from p_prdt_order order by ono asc

select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, stag.stname, prdt.titl, mete.nick nick, mete.name name1, mete2.nick nick2, mete2.name name2, mete2.phone, porder.cnt, prdt.pric, porder.payopt, porder.paydt, porder.ono, parc_name, parc_no
from p_prdt_order as porder inner join p_prdt as prdt inner join p_stag as stag inner join p_mete as mete inner join p_cert as cert inner join p_mete as mete2
on prdt.ptno = porder.ptno and prdt.stno = stag.stno AND porder.meno = mete.meno and mete2.meno = cert.meno and prdt.ctno = cert.ctno ,(select @rownum:=0)r
order by ono asc ) as a where rnum limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select COUNT(*)
from p_prdt_order as porder inner join p_prdt as prdt inner join p_stag as stag inner join p_mete as mete inner join p_cert as cert inner join p_mete as mete2
on prdt.ptno = porder.ptno and prdt.stno = stag.stno AND porder.meno = mete.meno and mete2.meno = cert.meno and prdt.ctno = cert.ctno

select * from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, stag.stname, prdt.titl, mete.nick nick, mete.name name1, mete2.nick nick2, mete2.name name2, mete2.phone, porder.cnt, prdt.pric, porder.payopt, porder.paydt, porder.ono, parc_name, parc_no
from p_prdt_order as porder inner join p_prdt as prdt inner join p_stag as stag inner join p_mete as mete inner join p_cert as cert inner join p_mete as mete2
on prdt.ptno = porder.ptno and prdt.stno = stag.stno AND porder.meno = mete.meno and mete2.meno = cert.meno and prdt.ctno = cert.ctno ,(select @rownum:=0)r
order by ono asc ) as a where rnum limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select ppo.paydt, ppo.payopt, ppo.tot_pric, ppo.parc_name, ppo.parc_no, ppo.tot_pric, ppo.cnt, ppo.ptno, ppt.titl as ptitl, ppt.ptno as pptno, pe2.nick as sellernick, ppt.phot as pphot from p_mete as pe inner join p_cls_order as pco inner join p_cls_ttab as pcb inner join p_cls as pc inner join p_cert as pct inner join p_prdt as ppt inner join p_prdt_order as ppo inner join p_mete as pe2
on pe.meno = pco.meno and pco.ctno = pcb.ctno and pcb.cno = pc.cno and pc.cno = pct.cno and pct.ctno = ppt.ctno and ppt.ptno = ppo.ptno and ppo.meno = pe2.meno where pe2.meno =#{meno} group BY ppt.ptno limit #{rowNo},#{size}
select ono, meno, ptno, cnt, tot_pric, payopt, paydt, parc_name, parc_no from p_prdt_order where meno=#{mentno}
select ono, meno, ptno, cnt, tot_pric, payopt, paydt, parc_name, parc_no from p_prdt_order where ptno=#{productno}
select ono, meno, ptno, cnt, tot_pric, payopt, paydt, parc_name, parc_no from p_prdt_order where ono=#{no}
